name: Comment Fields [Modify/Disable/Remove]

Plugin Description

Remove fields in comment, like URL or EMAIL. The only correct way of doing that.

Available Options

See available options and their description on plugin’s settings page.
sections.installation:
A) Enter your website “Admin Dashboard > Plugins > Add New” and enter the plugin name
or
B) Download plugin from WordPress.org , Extract the zip file and upload the container folder to “wp-content/plugins/”
sections.faq: • More at our WP plugins page.
